title: ANDavanai nambu
sahitya:
ANDavanai nambu unak-kadanAl kuraiyum ulagil vambu


anupallavi

  tANDavamADum nam idaya veLiyilE tangi magizhum saccidAnanda mUrttiyai


caraNam 1    tI mozhigaLaip-pEsha shiridum kUsuvadillai shivA enRu sholla nANrAi nAvE
tEmadhurat-tamizh maraiyai iraiyaip-pADum shelvaraip-pazhiyAdE nammai
  caraNam 2    nambum anbargaL mana amaidiyaip-pAr avar punnakai mukham pAr
 tavazh veNNITroLi paar vambar gumbalai viTaDiyAr kUTTattil
 anbu kulavum inbam nilavum tunbamara vandu
